title.rendered: Epub Version of Peter Thiel Lectures at Stanford University, CS183: Startup

content.rendered:
Last spring a prominent entrepreneur and venture capitalist Peter Thiel in Stanford University presented the course called Computer Science 183: Startup. Shortly before the course Thiel said: “If I do my job right, it will be the last thing that you have to learn.”


The main goal of Peter Thiel’s course was to share his experience on creating successful startups.

We created Epub version of his lectures on the basis of notes created by Blake Masters who’s blog was even appreciated by Forbes.
